statements: SELECT * FROM security_events;
SELECT event_id, event_date, event_type FROM security_events WHERE event_source = 'Database';
SELECT event_id, event_date, event_type, event_description FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Login' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_date, event_type, event_description FROM security_events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_description FROM security_events WHERE event_description LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY event_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Login' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_description FROM security_events WHERE event_date >= '2021-01-01' AND event_date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT event_id, event_date, event_type FROM security_events WHERE event_source = 'Internal' AND event_description LIKE '%Unauthorized%' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Error' AND event_source = 'External';
SELECT DISTINCT event_type FROM security_events WHERE event_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY event_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_type FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'login';
SELECT event_id, event_description FROM security_events WHERE event_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM security_devices WHERE device_type = 'firewall';
SELECT device_name, device_ip FROM security_devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_name, device_ip FROM security_devices WHERE device_type='Firewall';
SELECT event_type, event_description FROM security_events WHERE event_timestamp >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM security_devices WHERE device_type='Router' ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT event_type, COUNT(*) FROM security_events GROUP BY event_type ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT device_name, COUNT(*) AS device_count FROM security_devices GROUP BY device_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM security_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT incident_name, incident_date FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Malware';
SELECT log_date, log_type, log_description FROM security_logs WHERE log_type = 'Error' ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT event_name, event_type FROM security_events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date < '2023-01-01' AND incident_type IN ('Unauthorized Access', 'Data Breach');
SELECT * FROM security_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_type FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Unauthorized' AND event_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT event_name, incident_name, log_description FROM security_events JOIN security_incidents ON security_events.event_id = security_incidents.incident_id JOIN security_logs ON security_logs.log_type = 'Security Breach';
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Login' ORDER BY event_date LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_incidents FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
SELECT * FROM security_events;
SELECT event_name, event_type FROM security_events ORDER BY event_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM event_logs WHERE log_level = 'ERROR' ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Data Breach' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_type, event_description FROM security_events WHERE event_name LIKE '%attack%' ORDER BY event_name ASC;
SELECT id, incident_date, incident_type FROM incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Security Incident' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, log_date, log_message FROM event_logs WHERE log_level = 'ERROR' ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_events;
SELECT event_id, event_time, event_description FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Login';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, incident_date FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_location FROM security_devices WHERE device_type = 'Firewall';
SELECT * FROM security_events ORDER BY event_time DESC
SELECT event_id, event_description FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Login'
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, incident_date FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Breach' ORDER BY incident_date ASC
SELECT device_name FROM security_devices WHERE device_location = 'Server Room'
SELECT username, email, role FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin'
